name: Garden Wars
description: A casual and addictive mini-strategy that gives that RTS fix in a few minutes, without taking too much time or brain power! Dominate the garden by spreading your plants - use poison, rabbits, goats and more to destroy your neighbors plants - multiplayer or against the computer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1.5Ghz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space
